title: Unable to connect to authentication server
body: just as the title says, just played this morning, a few hours ago. Got back home, now it tells me this. I check server status, all green.

replies.body:
Issue still ongoing for me, have done a fresh install of the client and no change. A packet capture on my PC shows connectivity to the auth server establishing but after a delay the auth server sends back an alert and closes the connection. 

Getting pretty frustrated with this.

I've haven't yet seen any server problems this morning, so there might be something blocking your network from being able to reach our servers for some reason. Check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly making sure to set up port forwarding and flush your DNS if you haven't in a while. Let me know how that helps!
